channel.title: recordings on Present Minutes - for everyday meditation
channel.description: Recent content in recordings on Present Minutes - for everyday meditation

item.title: Guided meditations
item.description: Here are some guided meditations that you might find useful for your own practice. Your browser will likely let you play them directly from this page, but you can also download the MP3 files and store them on your phone or media player to use at your convenience - click on the three dots at the right-hand end to download.
